TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebProcessStatistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供評估執行中處理序健康狀態所需的資訊。

span.span: Provides information for assessing the health of a running process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 執行個體類別包含使用取得的資訊型別。Instances of the class contain information that is obtained using the type. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂的事件類別的範例，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of creating a custom event class, see the example provided in this topic. 以下是組態檔，您可以使用記錄的活動訊號事件包含程序的統計資料啟用 ASP.NET 的摘錄。The following is an excerpt of a configuration file you could use to enable ASP.NET to log heartbeat events that contain process statistics. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例有兩個部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一個是可讓 ASP.NET 使用自訂的事件，會使用組態檔的摘錄型別。The first is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event that uses the type. 第二個示範如何實作這個自訂的事件...The second shows how to implement this custom event.. 請確定您的自訂事件會引發在適當的時間，也就是會引發取代相等的系統健康狀態事件時。Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics/CS/webprocessstatisticsevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics/VB/webprocessstatisticsevent.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppDomainCount As Integer
public: property int AppDomainCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得處理序中的應用程式定義域個數。

span.span: Gets the number of application domains in the process.

value.span: 應用程式定義域的個數。

span.span: The number of application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常是指在此程序，包括預設的網域中的 ASP.NET 應用程式的數目。This property usually refers to the number of ASP.NET applications in the process, including the default domain. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得值。The following code example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics/CS/webprocessstatisticsevent.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics/VB/webprocessstatisticsevent.vb#5)]

param.name: formatter
param.span: 包含用來將 Web 健康情況事件資訊格式化之定位和縮排設定的 。

span.span: The that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.

summary.span: 將處理序統計資料安排成適當格式。

span.span: Formats the process statistics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供統一的格式如事件資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 它在當提供者會叫用的其中一個會在內部呼叫方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定自訂資訊的格式。The following code example shows how to format custom information. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics/CS/webprocessstatisticsevent.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics/VB/webprocessstatisticsevent.vb#14)]
